text: R Cancri is a Mira variable in the constellation Cancer. Located approximately distant, it varies between magnitudes 6.07 and 11.9 over a period of approximately 357 days. ==References== Category:Mira variables Category:Cancer (constellation) Category:M-type giants Cancri, R 3248 69243 Category:Emission- line stars 040543 Category:Durchmusterung objects
title: R Cancri
